page.title: 03A STRANGE NAME
page.content: {THE NOBODY INN THE NOBODY INN WAS BUILT IN THE 16TH CENTURY.IT WAS ONCE A CARPENTERS HOUSE.ONCEOF TWO COTTAGES WAS CALLED POPHILL.IT BECAME AN ALE AND CIDER HOUSE IN THE 19TH CENTURY.IN 1953 THE INN CHANGED ITS NAME FROM THE NEW INN TO THE NOBODY INN.IN 1960 THE CHADWICKS BROUGHT THE INN.THEY BUILT AN EXTENTION TO BE USED AS A BAR.THEY GOT SOME OF THE TIMBER FROM THE CHURCH.THEN IN 1965 SOME MORE PEOPLE BY THE NAME OF MASON.THEY BROUGHT THE INN .HARDLY ANY CHANGES WERE MADE. THEN IN 1970 THE BOLTONS AND THE BROSTSMITHS BROUGHT THE INN.THERE WERE LOTS OF CHANGES WHERE MADE. A NEW KITCHEN WAS BUILT,RESTURANT,STOCKROOM AND REDECORATED THE BEDROOMS AND IN SOME OF THEM PUT BATHROOMS.THE BAR AREA STILL REMAINS THE SAME.THE INN HASBEEN BROUGHT AND SOLD THREE TIMES.
